string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: Muhammad "Udil" Ardiansyah (born July 2, 2001) is an Indonesian player who is currently playing as a Mid Laner for AlterEgo. Nicknamed "Spicy Boy" because of his spicy words and taunts.
Aldhia "Aran" Aranda (born February 23, 2003) is an Indonesian player who is currently playing as an EXP Laner for AURA Fire.
Hengky "Kyy" Gunawan (born November 9, 2003) is an Indonesian player who is currently playing as a Roamer for Bigetron Alpha. Has 100% win rate with Diggie at Piala Presiden 2022 ( 6 win, 0 loss )
Dhannya "Haiz" Hoputra is an Indonesian player who is currently playing as a Gold Laner for Rebellion.
Rendy "Dyrennn" Syahputra (formerly known as Coyy) is an Indonesian player who is currently playing as an EXP Laner for RRQ Sena.
Gerald "Dlar" Trinchera (born September 3, 1999) is a Filipino player who is currently playing as an EXP Laner for EVOS Legends.
Manuel "Nnael" Simbolon (formerly known as Vi Mornov) (born January 18, 2006) is an Indonesian player who is currently playing as a Jungler for GEEK FAM.
Kairi "Kairi" Rayosdelsol (born September 21, 2005) is a Filipino player who is currently playing as a Jungler for ONIC.
Muhammad "Lemon" Ikhsan (born December 30, 1998) is an inactive Indonesian player who is currently playing as a Mid Laner for RRQ Hoshi.
Schevenko "Skylar" Tendean (born February 25, 2002) is an Indonesian player who is currently playing as a Gold Laner for RRQ Hoshi.
